}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Additional FCC IDs of Q87-HGA7S-5 (Linksys HGA7S, high gain antenna) and Q87-HGA5S-5 (Linksys HGA5S, high gain antenna)
"ENG-702-6500 PI-100_V00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
